title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama GitHub repo with the core CLI/server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API, published to npm as 'ollama'.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package (pip install langchain-ollama) for using Ollama models in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Full-featured ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’) with user auth, RAG, and plugin system.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, written in Node.js.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama team for using local LLMs in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any Discord server with slash commands.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir wrapper for Ollama API with GenServer-friendly streaming.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama allowing direct messages and channel mentions.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET/C# client for Ollama, distributed via NuGet.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger (CUE-based CI) module for spinning up Ollama containers in pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed async bindings for the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama instances for quick prototyping.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for running local LLM prompts on notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: n8n community node that adds Ollama chat and generate operations to no-code workflows.
